San_Rafael.Congregation Kol Shofar:
Congregation Kol Shofar is a Conservative synagogue founded in 1962 and located in Tiburon, California. The congregation is led by Rabbi Susan Leider who was ordained in 2006 by the Ziegler School of Rabbinic Studies and Rabbi Chai Levy who was ordained in 2002 by the Jewish Theological Seminary of America in New York City.


== History ==
In the 1960s and 1970s, Kol Shofar was a nomadic congregation, meeting in various locations around Marin County.
